entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Verified-Modules
entry.content: Azure Verified Modules (AVM) is an initiative to consolidate and set the standards for what a good Infrastructure-as-Code module looks like. Modules will then align to these standards, across languages (Bicep, Terraform etc.) and will then be classified as AVMs and available from their respective language specific registries.

entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk
entry.content: This is the Azure SDK parent repository and mostly contains documentation around guidelines and policies as well as the releases for the various languages supported by the Azure SDK.

entry.title: https://github.com/Micke-K/IntuneManagement
entry.content: Copy, export, import, delete, document and compare policies and profiles in Intune and Azure with PowerShell script and WPF UI. Import ADMX files and registry settings with ADMX ingestion. View and edit PowerShell script.

entry.title: https://github.com/Raphire/Win11Debloat
entry.content: A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps from Windows, disable telemetry, remove Bing from Windows search as well as perform various other changes to declutter and improve your Windows experience. This script works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

entry.title: https://github.com/dartraiden/NVIDIA-patcher
entry.content: Adds 3D acceleration support for P106-090 / P106-100 / P104-100 / P104-101 / P102-100 / CMP 30HX / CMP 40HX / CMP 50HX / CMP 70HX / CMP 90HX / CMP 170HX mining cards as well as RTX 3060 3840SP, RTX 3080 Ti 20 GB, RTX 4070 10 GB, and L40 ES.

entry.title: https://github.com/dfinke/ImportExcel
entry.content: PowerShell module to import/export Excel spreadsheets, without Excel

entry.title: https://github.com/dotnet/core
entry.content: .NET news, announcements, release notes, and more!

entry.title: https://github.com/jamesstringerparsec/Easy-GPU-PV
entry.content: A Project dedicated to making GPU Partitioning on Windows easier!

entry.title: https://github.com/jeppevinkel/jellyfin-tizen-builds
entry.content: The purpose of this repository is to automatically build the most up-to-date version of jellyfin-tizen.
